评论详情: So I waited until I wore it and washed it before this review. (I sew and I am a fussy clothes washer).  Great fit, well made, superior fabric. Zipper and details in the design and workmanship are quality. I washed it on gentle, cold water with a little clear detergent. Hung to dry and popped in the dryer just to fluff. WILL BE BUYING THIS ONE AGAIN!
The color, style and fit was perfect.

As others have mentioned it’s on the thin side. That’s what I wanted though. Perfect for plane rides. Some mentioned that the pants were short but I’m 5’6 and ordered a small. Good length for wearing sneakers. Not dragging but not too short either.

评论概述: Not all made with the same material
评论详情: I first ordered this set in grey and I love it. It’s soft and comfy material and fits great. I love it so much I ordered again in pink. The pink material is thin (too thin) and shiny, unlike the soft sweatshirt material of the grey set. Sadly, pink is going back.
Not true to size! Material is very nice. Top is too short!
The material is very thin.  It is soft, and yet I thought it would be more substantial like sweatshirt/lounge thickness.  Also, the top is cut short, small and cropped.

评论概述: Thinner than they used to be
评论详情: I had a navy set I bought in March 2023 and it was much thicker. I lost weight and the new set is just not as thick. Fine for summer travel but not winter. Color on the moss green is pretty. It also stains very easily.
I didn’t get any other pictures standing up. I got a size medium. I love the quality of it and how sleek it looks can dress it up or down.

if you are skinny you will love this.  the fabric is really soft and nice.  i wish i could keep it but the topis way too short.  i’m 5’7” and there’s no butt or stomach coverage at all.  loved it otherwise.
I like the fit of the pants, but the top is not oversized. It is snug and I ordered my normal size and the size recommended for me based on previous orders.
Beautiful loungwear. Soft and true to size
Fabric was weird. After I washed it, it has “wet stains” on it that don’t go away
Great to travel then!

评论概述: Very comfortable Super soft and lightweight
评论详情: I love this and may order another one!  Very comfortable! I live in Florida so having a lightweight, track suit absolutely works for me.  It runs true to size but it is  stretchy. I ordered a 2XL and the pants are very long. I am 5 ft 9 inches so if you are shorter, you may have to hem them.

I was really looking forward to receiving this tracksuit.  I loved the material!  It's super soft!  It isn't thick so I don't think this would be suitable if you're looking for something to provide warmth.  My biggest disappointment however, was that the pants are too short.  I'm 5'3 1/2" and the pants with the medium size suit were too short. Very disappointed.  Returned.
I love this outfit. It has been a perfect leisure yet winter type outfit for being on the go or as active as I am. I plan to get a couple more colors
I read about different suits. This had good reviews. My DIL loved it. The color and fabric are beautiful!. I would recommend this to a friend.
Was a gift. Daughter liked it.
Very nice fit and feel
Very comfortable.  Material is very soft and very well made.
i only got the shirt. pants never arrived.

Love the fabric; soft, stretchy, smooth. Feels great on the skin. Color is as posted. Very luscious dark gray. With the amount of stretch doubtful of shrinkage. True to size. Had I gone up a size, as I usually do, the pants would have been saggy and top sleeves and shoulders would be way off my measurements. Will most likely order in another color. Cost was very acceptable.
Comfort. Washing ability  Beautiful color.

this is a high quality two piece set you can wear to work or play; great fit, fantastic material.  i bought the blue color and  bought my mom the hunter green set.  can wear in cool and cold seasons.  great travel set; will buy again
Love this outfit!  So comfy, soft, and lays perfectly!  Totally worth the price and washes very nice.  I always hang dry it but if you dry in the dryer…. It’s doesn’t shrink.True to size

评论概述: This set is very nice, the colors white is Cream or winter white is not white
评论详情: The fit is a little snug, but it’s very nice material. I want it white but, the color is not the white. It is more of a cream color.
Pretty color, comfortable fabric. Perfect for a long plane trip.

Luv this set. I’m short and the pant length is perfect.  The color is a nice neutral green - army green - and goes great with my blonde hair. I live in Texas - so it’s provides enough warmth.  Wouldn’t be warm enough if I lived in a cold climate.
While I love the style and fit the material stains terribly.  It you get water splashed on you when it dries there are spots.  I dribbled milk on it and the spots did not come out in the wash.
The fabric is fine I must say, but the color doesn’t much at all with the picture from Amazon.
Pants are short for a size large
Love this leisure suit so much I bought a second one.
The fit is perfect. Quality is great. Will buy more from this company.

评论概述: Too small for the size I ordered
评论详情: I ordered an XL hoping for it to be a bit baggy. This barely fit. The waist is made for a medium and the top sits right on my waist. This will be going back. It's horrible. Don't waste your money.
Extremely soft yet sturdy material. Love it so much
I am 5'9" 195lbs and this fit perfectly. Not to mention how soft and comfortable the material is. It fits true to size.
This set feels really soft is flattering and true to size. I am between a 6 and 8 and got a medium.
Love the color ! Looks great. I first bought it in large but rebought it in small

Very good quality. IM 5’4 in height, 125 lbs and the size small fits perfect for me. Length is perfect. I recommend buying this. Beautiful and it’s comfortable wearing around the house or running errands.
These ensembles are very comfy. I bought 3 in different colors. But the tops are not nearly as full as they picture on the model. If it was fuller I would have given them 5 ⭐️

The quality was great and super soft but ended up returning b as the top was really short compared to the pants. Too bad as it had great potential and if you don’t mind mid length tops you will like it. Pants are wide leg as well.
Very comfortable,  quality of material is great. Laundered well. I personaly did not place in dryer, no need to press
I really like the product. It fits well and is very comfortable. I would recommend this outfit to anyone
Love this new set.  It's lightweight but not too lightweight.  Will be perfect for travel.  Fabric is soft and color is the same as marketing picture.

评论概述: Please lengthen the pants because otherwise it’s perfect!
评论详情: This has to be the softest, most comfortable outfit I’ve ever put on my body! However, the pants are so short. Idk how tall the model was on the photo but I’m 5’8 and they are 2” above my ankle. I’m keeping them because I LOVE it, but please consider lengthening the pants!! I’ll buy every color!

Love this set but went with the size  recommendation from Prime but should have trusted my gut. I’m 5’4” and weigh 135-140. Should definitely have gone with the medium. The material is not thick but would be fine for spring and fall. Tried to exchange at the same price I purchased for Black Friday but was not able so I returned the set. My rating is more because of my experience with Prime than the set.
looks great and feels nice but very thin fabric.  Not for winter months
I am 237 lbs 5'4ft , I brought a xl and I love it. Soft and super comfortable. Definitely a good choice
Uncomfortable feel, cheap material, ran big

Beautiful lounge  set

This tracksuit is super stylish and the fabric is soft and comfortable.  The only caution I would give you is that it is not super warm.  It's perfect for me here in Florida but if I was in a cooler climate I'd want to have some long johns on underneath.  Great for in between seasons or milder winters though.  I want it in a dozen colors I love it so much!

I love the feel and comfort of this set but it does nothing to keep you warm outside. Feels like air goes straight through. I could see it being comfortable in late spring and even summer. Great for lounge around
Beautiful quality, luxurious fabric.
I got this two days ago, opened it today, already has picks in the fabric. Returning.

I buy clothes on occasion from Amazon and 75% of the time I end up returning because they aren’t what they were marketed to be. But not this set! I was so pleasantly surprised, the material is soft and comfortable, the collar of the shirt stands up as pictured, and the length is just right (ordered size M, I am 5’4”). Only drawback is the waist, its pretty tight although I like that the waistband is flat in front (not ruched). So basically have to wear the waistband at your true waist to be comfortable. But I otherwise love it and can deal with the waistband issue. Will be great for travel. Got it on black Friday sale which was a great deal for this product.

So as I was pulling this out of the bag, I immediately noticed how buttery soft the material was I couldn’t wait to put it on! When I did, however, I noticed that the pants are about an inch too short. It doesn’t look terrible, but it’s not quite my personal taste. When I went back and looked at the reviews. I noticed that everyone that said that the length was perfect was 5’2” and I’m 5’3” (whomp whomp) I’ve decided to keep it however because I really think it’s so comfortable and it’s fine to WFH, carpool, etc. but the Tyler folks may want a size up. I am going to get a second set, but I will be getting a medium and not a small..
Love the set. Wish the top was a little longer, but overall it's fantastic
These are very thin and horrible quality
Material is too thin and runs a little big.

The material is silky cotton like. I am 170 lb's, 5'4 and I bought a large. The fit is perfect with extra room. I could actually go down to a medium, however I am in love with this fit. It's comfortable, flows and beautiful to wear. I tried it on as soon as it got here. I haven't wore it yet or washed it. I will update when I wash it. By the way I am ordering two more in beige and light blue.
I was so excited to receive this outfit. The material felt wonderful. While trying it on noticed one pant leg was shorter then the other and it was noticeable. So returning it and will order again.
The top is short but the bottoms were fine. Very soft.
Not at all as described
Great fit, loose comfortable, forgiving. Fabric is on the thinner side and would not keep you warm in cold weather.

This set was so comfortable I bought a second set the first time I wore the first one. I love the fit and the feel of the material. However, after only 2 wears the olive green color is pilling. Considering the price of the set that’s incredibly disappointing.
Soft yet heavy weight fabric. Good fit and True to size. I will buy again

It’s very comfortable and flattering. However the zipper in the top is very cheap. It catches and worse if the fabric comes into contact with the zipper it snags the fabric. I’d only purchase again if it came with a better zipper.
Very soft and comfortable 😌 nice fit great value for the money.
Soft material good quality for money spent
Too short
Loved this fabric and style but it was way to long legs so we could not keep this. Wish they had in seam choices.

I'm 5'5, 160, bought a medium and LOVED it. Great material, loved the sleeve having a thumb keyhole and very comfortable. The length was a little long for my height but with shoes, I had no problems! will buy a couple more!!!
I’m short (5’0) and ordered the medium and pants were waaaaayyyy long. I had to roll over the waistband. Too fit great.

评论概述: Cute set. Pants run a little short.
评论详情: I really like the look and feel of this set. I’m 5’8” and these pants are def a little short on me. Not a deal breaker, since I primarily wear for lounging. If I’m wearing this set to the grocery store or out-and-about I just pull the waist band down a little bit or wear with boots, ha ha!

Love the way it feels and quality but its basically “floods”…highwaters on my 5’9 body. This could have worked if the pants were supposed to be  worn like this but it hits in a weird way. Very sad. It’s not even close to my ankles. I ordered a large. I am 5’9 and 185 lbs. Sadly, returning these today.

This is an update to my review. The seller was very kind and responded. I sent pictures and they told me to request a refund. While waiting, I ordered the burgundy set which is beautiful and both legs are the same length. I feel that the green was a manufactured mess up. The seller made the green unavailable so I’m not returning mine, I’ll just get the legs altered. When I tell you that the green color is sooooo rich and beautiful that I can not send it back without a replacement. Maybe they will get it right and start selling the green again. I give this set a 10.  This is a beautiful lounging set, however one pants leg is longer than the other. I would return it but I wore it trying to make it work. If it was the same I would give it a 10. I pray that the owners will see this and make it right. I would love to purchase every color because it is beautiful material and the color is very rich. Hopefully this was a mishap and they will make good on this purchase hard. If they do I will give an update and change my review.
Softest fabric- so cute and flattering! Definitely recommend and looks elegant and sharp !
loved the feel of the material, pretty much wrinkle free.  Very close to the spanx set.  Casual but put together at the same time.  I love it.

I ordered my normal size, but it didn't fit anywhere near like it does on the model picture! Pants were toooooo short and I'm only 5'4". Top was short too, and never could I have tucked it in. If you're skin is dry, it'll cling on you! It's that kind of material... slick where you need to spray it. I returned it.
So comfortable & accurate sizing. Loved it so much I bought it in black too!

Inconsistent quality Bought a brown color it was good cosy well made Than I decided to buy another color When it came it wasn’t as the first one Very thin cheap looking and very tight i wear large Orderd large didn’t fit So I gave it a 1 star for inconsistency in quality and size
I love the material, however the top is too small. I wish each piece came separately so I could get the perfect fit.
I bought this set when it was on sale. It was a nice light weight set and it fit great,  but I didn’t love the color so I ended up returning it.
Love, love, love this outfit! It’s comfy and casual, yet elevated enough to look chic. The fabric is a perfect weight, and the flair is perfect.
I am 54 and 110 pounds and extra small fits perfectly. It’s a great little sit to run around town and do errands or lounge at home. I find it not to be too hot even if I sleep in it.
Quality attire at an amazing price! Great fit. My daughter has already ordered two more sets as all the color choices are nice!
